tweets: Your dollars are melting. The dollar lost 97% since 1913. Bitcoin was literally designed as the antidote. Not a meme. A necessity.
10,000 Bitcoin bought 2 pizzas in 2010. Those pizzas would cost $689M today. That's not about pizza. That's what happens when you bet on scarcity and get it right.
You don't need a million to win. $50/month starting in 2015 is worth $1.2M now. Bitcoin doesn't care how small you start. Time compounds everything.

topics: "Your keys, your Bitcoin. Not your keys, not your Bitcoin."
